High-level Military Delegation of China Arrives
    Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A high-level military delegation of the Chinese People's Liberation Army led by Colonel General Xu Caihou, director of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who is member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and member of its Central Military Commission, arrived here today.
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by General Pak Jae Gyong, Colonel General Pak Sung Won, generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, Ambassador Wu Donghe and Yan Jiangfeng, military attache of the Chinese embassy here.    
 A ceremony of welcoming the delegation took place at the airport.
